title: QU4RTZ Café?
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Alright! We've decided to give out QU4RTZ donuts to everyone at the next QU4RTZ live~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What kind of donuts shall we make? We could go with plain donuts with a load of toppings, but it would also be fun to add flavor and color to the dough itself!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m puzzled. Rina-chan Board says, “Dizzy.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>In times like this, you should try out recipes! Let's make and try everything we think is good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Mmmm, buono! They were all super delicious! Why are all donuts this tasty?!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin regrets not making more of the okara donuts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I put a lot of toppings on mine. I could taste different flavors with every bite. Delicious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I put whipped cream inside mine...... But I like all of our donuts so much, I can't choose just one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Wow, everyone's opinions are so different~! Deciding on donuts was a perfect idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hey, since we all made our own donuts and we can’t decide on only one to give out, why don’t we make them all part of a set. A donut set~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want there to be a drink set too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin agrees!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright! Now, let’s try brewing different blends of tea and see what we like~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
